name: C# KPI for Smart-M3
short_description: A C# implementation of the Smart Space Access Protocol to access Smart-M3 (http://sourceforge.net/projects/smart-m3/). Hosted by the University of Bologna and under development within the ARTEMIS SOFIA project (http://www.sofia-project.eu/)
